ruling: - You cannot activate [[Stray Lambs]] the same turn that you Summon, Flip Summon, or Special Summon. But you can perform a Set the same turn. So you can activate [[Stray Lambs]] and then Tribute one of them to Set [[Labyrinth Wall]].
- You can't activate [[Stray Lambs]] unless you have at least 2 vacant Monster Card Zones.
